name: kindora-astro
title: Kindora Astro
desc: Crafted for charity, non-profits, NGOs and fundraising campaigns
article:
Kindora Astro is a clean and modern website theme built specifically for non-profit organizations, charities, and fundraising campaigns. Powered by Astro and Tailwind CSS, it provides an intuitive, mission-focused layout that helps organizations showcase their causes, raise funds, and build trust with their community online.


Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4


Key Features:

  • 15+ Complete Pages
  • 97+/100 Google PageSpeed Score on Desktop
  • GTM, Mailchimp & Disqus pre-configure
  • Highly customizable (Colors, Fonts, Menus, Social Links, SEO Meta Tags, etc.)
  • Built with Astro and Tailwind CSS
  • Netlify & Vercel setting pre-configured
  • Write and update content in Markdown / MDX
  • MDX components auto-import
  • Fully responsive across desktops, tablets, and smartphones
  • Clean folder structure
  • SEO Friendly
  • Animation on scroll
  • Integrated Contact Form
  • Free Google Fonts
  • Font Awesome icons support
  • Free lifetime updates
  • Detailed Documentation

Unique Pages:

  1. Home
  2. About Us
  3. Teams
  4. Causes
  5. Program Details
  6. Donation
  7. Blog
  8. Blog Details
  9. Reviews
  10. Programs
  11. Contact Us
  12. Elements
  13. 404
  14. Privacy Policy
  15. Terms & Conditions
